name: Joker
tagline: Digital rythmo band system for dubbing and postsynchronisation purposes.
body:
### Welcome

`Joker` is a tool that let you dub movie from one language to another.

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with `Joker`? Check out the documentation at http://www.joker.io/doc or contact support@phonations.com and weâ€™ll help you sort it out.
